bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition whereby a patient has a feeling of a heavy and numb body, brought forth by being affected by wind cold. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 23: 風屍者，在人四肢，循環經絡， 其狀淫躍去來，沉沉默默，不知痛處，若衝風則發是也 , “ Wind[-type] corpse [qi] travels in one’s four limbs through the conduits and network vessels. It is as if something were coming and going with wild leaps, deep insideandwithout a sound. One cannot identify a specific region that hurts. It breaks out whenever one is affected by wind”.
